emissions.closest_match_explanation: The ingredient '2 fed hvidløg' is best matched with 'hvidløg' because 'hvidløg' is the most direct and least processed form of garlic available in the database, aligning with the rule of choosing the least processed option when no specific processing is mentioned.
The ingredient '1 spsk olivenolie' is directly matched with 'olivenolie' as it is an exact match and represents the least processed form of olive oil among the given options.

The ingredient '1 løg' is best matched with 'løg' as it is the most direct and least processed form of onion available in the database, aligning with the rule of choosing the least processed option when no specific processing is mentioned.

The ingredient '1 dl grøntsagsbouillon' is best matched with 'bouillon, hønsekød, spiseklar' because it is the closest available option for a ready-to-use bouillon. While 'grøntsagsbøf' is a vegetable-based option, it is a solid food, not a bouillon. 'Bouillon, oksekød, koncentreret, terning' and 'bouillon, oksekød, spiseklar' are beef-based, which is not a good match for vegetable bouillon. Therefore, 'bouillon, hønsekød, spiseklar' is the most reasonable match among the given choices, as it is a ready-to-eat bouillon, and the rule of realistic comparisons allows for a broader category if an exact match is not available, and chicken bouillon is closer to vegetable bouillon than beef bouillon in terms of common usage and lower emissions.

The ingredient '1 dåse hakkede tomater' is best matched with 'tomat, flået, konserves' because 'hakkede tomater' implies a processed, canned form of tomatoes, and 'flået, konserves' (peeled, canned) is the closest option in terms of processing and form. 'Soltørrede tomater' and 'tomatpure, koncentreret' represent different processing methods.
The ingredient '1 squash' is directly matched with 'squash' as it is an exact match and represents the least processed form of squash among the given options.

The ingredient '1 dåse sorte bønner' is best matched with 'sorte bønner, konserves' because 'dåse' indicates a canned product, and 'konserves' (canned) is the most appropriate processing match. Other options are either raw beans or different types of beans.

The ingredient '1 dåse kidneybønner' is best matched with 'kidney bønner, konserves' because 'dåse' indicates a canned product, and 'konserves' (canned) is the most appropriate processing match. Other options are either different types of beans or not canned.

The ingredient '300 g majs' is best matched with 'majs, kerner, konserves' because 'majs' without further specification often refers to corn kernels, and 'konserves' (canned) is a common form for packaged corn, making it a reasonable match for processing. 'Majs, hele kolber' (whole cobs) is less processed, and 'majsmel' (cornmeal) is a more processed form. 'Babymajs' is a different type of corn.

The ingredient '8 tortillas pandekager' is best matched with 'tortillabrød, hvede' because 'tortillas pandekager' directly translates to tortilla pancakes, and 'tortillabrød, hvede' (tortilla bread, wheat) is the most direct and common form of tortilla available. Other options are either different types of pancakes or chips.

The ingredient '150 g cheddar ost' does not have a direct match in the database. Among the available cheese options, 'parmesan ost, 32+' has the highest emission factor (5.4 kg CO2e / kg) compared to 'gedeost, ost' (1.6 kg CO2e / kg) and 'brie, ost 45+' (1.6 kg CO2e / kg). Following the rule of choosing the option with the highest emission factor when multiple viable options have similar processing levels (all are types of cheese), 'parmesan ost, 32+' is selected as the best match.

The ingredient '1 håndfuld frisk koriander' does not have a direct match in the database. Among the available options, 'persille' is the closest broader category as it is also a fresh herb commonly used for seasoning, aligning with the rule of using a broader category if an exact ingredient match is not available and the broader category does not violate rule 1 (realistic comparisons). The other options (cucumber, rhubarb, celery) are vegetables and not herbs.

The ingredient '1 spsk smør' is directly matched with 'smør, saltet' as it is the most direct and least processed form of butter available in the database, aligning with the rule of choosing the least processed option when no specific processing is mentioned.
